solution_line_template: His bedroom is {bedroom_sqft} sq ft and his bathroom is {bathroom_sqft} sq ft so these two rooms are {bedroom_sqft}+{bathroom_sqft} = <<{bedroom_sqft}+{bathroom_sqft}={combined_sqft}>>{combined_sqft} sq ft

He wants the new room to be twice as large as his bedroom/bathroom that is {combined_sqft} sq so the new room is {multiplier}*{combined_sqft} = <<{multiplier}*{combined_sqft}={new_room_sqft}>>{new_room_sqft} sq ft
